document.full_text: japanese prime minister naoto kan on thursday survived a no-confidence vote by offering to resign once he has overcome the worst of the country's nuclear crisis, a last-minute deal with ruling party rebels who had threatened to oust him from office.
document.title: japan pm survives with offer to quit once crisis overcome
lines_and_colors: japanese prime minister naoto kan on thursday survived a no-confidence vote by offering to resign once he has overcome the worst of the country's nuclear crisis, a last-minute deal with ruling party rebels who had threatened to oust him from office.
